name: Cachiche
description:
Inspired in the "Las brujas de Cachiche" folktale, you have been cursed and your head turned into a pumpkin. Now you must fight the Witch and her allies to save Cachiche from her magic.

Made using Godot for the Mini Jam 89: Pumpkin.

Controls: WASD to move, Mouse to aim, Left click to shoot, Right click to perform a headbutt or talk to the tarotist
